entry.title: Famous Design Zodiac Jar of 50pcs-32mm Silicone Extract Containers Multi Colors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: STASH
Price: 59.90

Dab like Mercury is in retrograde with these Zodiac containers. Extracts can be sticky and tend to be tough to remove from glass. Keep your mind at ease with Famous Design’s silicone containers. No more wasted material or worries. Each silicone capsule is 32mm and is the perfect size to store your concentrates. Bring it with you on the go, or keep it safe and secure at home with the threaded closure. These Zodiac containers come in a multitude of rainbow colours, making them as unique as you are. They’re each adorned with one of twelve zodiac signs. Dab like the stars are aligned. Every jar contains a random assortment of 50 extract containers.

entry.title: Dopezilla 30mm Lego Cube Silicone Stash Jar – 25/Jar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dopezilla
Type: Stash
Price: 49.90

Keep your concentrates fresh and dab like a BEAST with silicone storage solutions from Dopezilla!

  • High-grade Silicone
  • Airtight Seal
  • Non-Stick Surface
  • Familiar Lego Block Style
  • Eye-Catching Design w/ Beast Logo
  • Conveniently Packaged in a 25-count Jar
  • Measures 30mm x 30mm

The Dopezilla Silicone Lego Cube Stash Jar does everything you would expect a top-quality storage container to do. The difference is these mythical stash jars look badass while doing it. Eith an impressive airtight seal, they make the perfect companion for smokers who want to safely secure some concentrate, or even a little bit of bud.

These funky, multi-coloured silicone cubes have a textured top that looks like a lego brick. They’re easy to spot, and easy to recognize while rummaging around blind in a bag or pocket. Each one features a printed Dopezilla logo of a best-selling beasts from across the Dopezilla universe! Cerberus, Basilisk, Hydra, they’re all there. Plus, the illusive Minotaur makes an appearance!

These amazing little stach jars come conveniently packaged in a 25-count jar. Perfect for POP sale, you can simply open the lid, and literally release the kraken.

entry.title: Famous Stash Ceramic Jar – Black – Small – 200ML
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Stash
Price: 12.49

Keep your sticky-icky safely stowed with these new stash jars from Famous Design. The black ceramic body blocks harmful UV light and helps keep your flower as fresh as can be. The threaded metal lid provides an airtight seal which will prevent your stash from drying out and taking on harshness or bad taste. This little jar is affordable, durable, and will provide you with tasty toking materials for years to come.

This attractive all-black jar is designed with sleek in mind and features a minimalist Famous Brandz star on the top of the lid. The 200ml size is ideal for concentrates or smaller amounts of flower. It’s secure and compact form make it well-suited for portable use and an ideal companion for smokers on the go.

  • Black ceramic body
  • Threaded metal lid
  • Blocks sunlight and UV rays
  • Provides an airtight seal
  • Available in 200ml and 800ml

entry.title: Famous Design Stash Jar Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Stash
Price: 2.49 - 2.99 (2 variants)

Keep your flower fresh with the new stash jars from Famous Design. They feature UV resistant glass, so the sunlight doesn’t get in and destroy your dank. The threaded lid helps maintain an airtight seal on this well-designed container. If you leave your stash out or in a non-airtight jar it will dry out resulting in a bad taste and harsh feeling while smoking. This stash jar comes in 2 sizes: 120ml for smaller amounts and 180ml for larger amounts. This all-black jar features the gold Famous Brandz star on the lid, adding style to this otherwise plain container.

entry.title: Hinged Cap Vial Joint Tube-Assorted-92mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Stash
Price: 0.15

Hinged cap
Translucent
Variety of colors
Smell proof
Airtight
92mm/3.6”

Take this tube on the go. Pop in your pre-rolls and head out on your next adventure. Whether you’re off to your friends place for a sweet session or retreating to the cottage, these tubes are the best way to bring your blunts.

This 92mm/3.6” tube gives you the space to pack a couple pre-rolls. It also comes equipped with a hinged cap. This ensures you don’t lose the top while you’re loading or unloading the container. It’s smell proof design is perfect for keeping things under wraps at the office or stuffing what you’ve partially smoked inside. The airtight aspect lets you keep your stash securely in the tube without it getting super dry and harsh.

Need to keep an eye on what’s inside? These tubes come in a variety of see-through colours perfect for checking how much you have left.

entry.title: CR Joint Tube-Matte Grey-78mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant
Type: Stash
Price: 0.15

Pop top
Opaque
Smell proof
Airtight
78mm/3”

Pop your pre-rolls inside this tube and get ready to go. Ideal to prepare you for your next adventure. Whether you’re off to your friends place for a sweet session or retreating to the cottage, this tube is a great compact companion.

This 78mm/3” tube allows you to perfectly pack 1 ¼ joints inside. The pop top makes sure you don’t lose the lid while you’re packing or unpacking your pre-rolls. The container is smell proof to protect against skunky smells, super handy if you’re packing your half smoked session. The airtight seal keeps your stash inside fresh so it doesn’t dry out and get super harsh.

Keep what you packed under wraps. These matte grey tubes are opaque and perfectly hide what’s inside.

Pop your pre-rolls inside and head out on an adventure. These tubes helps conceal your cannabis while you’re catching a ride to the cabin or on your way to a sweet session.

This tube is 115mm/4.5”, giving you enough space to store King size joints for your journey. The threaded lid helps keep your stash secure inside a pocket or bag.  It prevents skunky smells from escaping as well. This is the ideal solution if you’re storing something especially dank. The lid also aids in being airtight, this helps ensure your stash doesn’t get dry and harsh.

Want to keep what you’ve packed a secret? These black, opaque tubes help you perfectly hide what’s inside.

entry.title: Famous Design Smell Proof Bag Gray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Stash
Price: 19.99

Store your stash in style. This new smell proof bag from Famous Design lets you keep your stash and smoking accessories all in one place. Durable and padded, this bag is 80mm x 180mm x 80mm. Toss it in your bag if you’re on the go, or leave it at home without any smells leaking out. Lock it up when you need to with a personalized code knowing everything inside is safe. This rectangular bag is adorned with the classic, black Famous Brandz star on the front to match the handle, lock and zipper and looks great against the dark, grey fabric bag.

entry.title: Famous Design Stash Bag Gray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Stash
Price: 14.99

Safely store your stash! The new stash bag from Famous Design is the perfect, portable solution for travelling with your herb. Toss it in your backpack, purse or overnight bag. This durable, padded bag is 190mm x 280mm, allowing you to bring along some smoking accessories as well. Keep people out with the personalized lock feature and keep smells in with the smell proof exterior. Adorned with the classic, black Famous Brandz star on the front to match the zipper and lock, it creates a minimalistic look on the dark, grey fabric bag.
